edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The game engine. It stores the game state and controls the mechanics of the game.

      • isValidSpawnLocation

        private boolean isValidSpawnLocation(int row,
                                     int col)
        Checks if the specified location is valid for spawning an enemy.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the target location.
        col - The column of the target location.
        Returns:
        True if this location is valid, false if it is not.

      • isSpawnOccupied

        private boolean isSpawnOccupied(int row,
                                int col)
        Checks if this location is occupied by an Actor or a Room.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the target location.
        col - The column of the target location.
        Returns:
        True if the spawn is occupied, false otherwise.

      • isSpawnTooClose

        private boolean isSpawnTooClose(int row,
                                int col)
        Checks if the specified enemy spawn location is too close to the player.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the enemy spawn location.
        col - The column of the enemy spawn location.
        Returns:
        True of the spawn is too close, false otherwise.
